# trackingAreaCode

**Instance Property**

The Tracking Area Code of the private LTE network.

## Declaration

```swift
var trackingAreaCode: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is only applicable for band 48 private LTE networks.

## Accessing network properties

- **mobileCountryCode**: The Mobile Country Code (MCC) of the private LTE network.
- **mobileNetworkCode**: The Mobile Network Code (MNC) of the private LTE network.
